DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the effects of hyaluronic acid (HA) on bone healing in human dental sockets.
DOC.brief_title: Use of Hyaluronic Acid as a Therapeutic Strategy for Bone Repair in Human
DOC.criteria: Orthodontic need for bilateral extraction of lower first premolars Alcoholism, smoking, drug use and abuse of drugs; Systemic diseases: uncontrolled diabetes, blood dyscrasias, kidney or heart failure and osteoporosis; clinical or radiographic signs of pathological processes in the bone;
